description.2477: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Orirock</>-type material, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>90%</>
description.2689: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Elite materials</>, increases the byproduct production rate by <@cc.vup>5%</> for every <@cc.kw>1</> Operator with <@cc.vup>4</> or less Morale assigned to the Dorms
description.2799: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, <@cc.kw>Medic</> Operators' Specialization training speed <@cc.vup>+60%</>
description.2902: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>40%</>
description.3470: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, <@cc.kw>Guard</> Operators' Specialization training speed <@cc.vup>+30%</>; if training this skill to Specialization Level <@cc.vup>3</>, training speed will be further increased by <@cc.vup>+45%</>
description.3496: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Chips</>, reduces the Morale consumed by all corresponding formulas that cost <@cc.kw>2</> Morale by <@cc.vup>-1</>
description.3742: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.55</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.3970: When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, the productivity contributed by all other Operators in that Factory <@cc.vdown>becomes 0</> (excluding productivity granted based on facility count), but each <@cc.kw>Power Plant</> increases that Factory's productivity by <@cc.vup>+15%</>
description.3990: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, <@cc.kw>Medic</> Operators' Specialization training speed <@cc.vup>+30%</>
description.4201: When this Operator is assigned to a Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>50%</>, and for every<@cc.vup>1</> <$cc.bd_ash><@cc.rem>Intelligence Reserve</></>, increases extra <@cc.vup>5%</>; if the number of <$cc.bd_tachanka><@cc.rem>Ursus Specialty Beverages</></> reaches <@cc.vup>4</> bottles, increases extra <@cc.vup>15%</>
description.4212: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.55</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); if the target is <@cc.kw>Gavial</>, further increases Morale restored by <@cc.vup>+0.45</>
description.4357: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, decreases own morale consumption by<@cc.vdown>+0.5</>; and when self morale is above<@cc.kw>12</>, <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></><@cc.vup>+10</>
description.4581: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order acquisition efficiency <@cc.vup>+15%</> and the order limit <@cc.vup>+2</>
description.4617: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Penguin Logistics</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood).
description.4815: When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, productivity <@cc.vup>+15%</>
description.5197: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, Morale consumed per hour <@cc.vdown>+1</> when training a <@cc.kw>Supporter</> Operator's skill to Specialization Level <@cc.vup>3</>
description.5402: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, <@cc.kw>Supporter</> Operators' Specialization training speed <@cc.vup>+50%</>
description.5425: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Elite materials</>, increases the Morale consumed by all corresponding formulas by <@cc.vdown>+2</>
description.5487: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, every <@cc.vup>1</> <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragment</></> is converted into <@cc.vup>1</> <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></>. When Morale is fully consumed, remove all <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragments</></> and accumulated <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></>
description.5730: When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, capacity limit is increased by <@cc.vup>+12</> when producing <@cc.kw>Battle Records</>
description.6025: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Chips</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>80%</>
description.6060: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Building materials</>, reduces the Morale consumed by all corresponding formulas that cost <@cc.kw>4</> Morale by <@cc.vup>-2</>

description.7050: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, if there are <@cc.kw>2</> or more <$cc.tag.op><@cc.kw>Operation Platforms</></> assigned to <@cc.kw>Power Plants</>, all Factories' productivity <@cc.vup>+2%</> (only the most effective one will take effect when assigned Operators have the same skill effect)
description.7113: When this Operator is assigned to be the Trainer in the Training Room, increases the Specialization training speed of <@cc.kw>Supporter</> Operators by <@cc.vup>+30%</>, and further increases this speed by <@cc.vup>+65%</> if training the skill to Specialization Level <@cc.vup>3</>

description.7737: When this Operator is assigned to a Power Plant, increases the drone recovery rate by <@cc.vup>+15%</>
description.7799: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, each <$cc.g.sp><@cc.kw>Alternate Operator</></> increases the Morale of all Operators in the Control Center by <@cc.vup>+0.05</> per hour
description.7995: When this Operator is assigned to a Power Plant, increases the drone recovery rate by <@cc.vup>+10%</>
description.8174: When this Operator is assigned to the Control Center, if the HR contacting speed of the HR Office is lower than <@cc.vup>+30%</> (including the base 5%), increase the HR contacting speed by <@cc.vup>+20%</> (unique effect across the entire base, unaffected by other effects)
description.8788: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order limit <@cc.vup>+5</> and Morale consumed per hour <@cc.vup>-0.25</>

description.986d: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, if the amount of <@cc.kw>Pure Gold</> traded is higher than <@cc.kw>3</>, increase the LMD gained by <@cc.kw>+500</>, and Morale consumed per hour is reduced by <@cc.vup>-0.25</> (only applies to orders generated after the Operator is assigned)
description.7e8d: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>60%</>
description.d2dc: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>50%</>
description.cc89: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, the production rate of byproduct increases by <@cc.vup>65%</>
description.c237: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, reduces the Morale consumed by all formulas that cost <@cc.kw>4</> Morale or more by <@cc.vup>-2</>
description.a933: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>any material</>, this Operator's Morale will be <@cc.kw>restored once</> for every <@cc.vup>2</> times no byproducts are produced during processing, equal to the Morale consumed <@cc.kw>for processing that corresponding formula one time</> (the final Morale total is calculated after processing is completed)
description.dd29: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>elite material</>, the corresponding formulas will only consume <@cc.vup>2</> Morale
description.d5bb: When this Operator is assigned to the Workshop to process <@cc.kw>Elite materials</>, increases the byproduct production rate by <@cc.vup>40%</>, and decreases the Morale consumption of recipes that cost <@cc.kw>8</> Morale or more by <@cc.vup>-4</>

description.5da0: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered <@cc.vup>+0.85</> per hour

description.62f9: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered <@cc.vup>+0.75</> per hour
description.90a9: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, increases own Morale restored per hour by <@cc.vup>+0.7</>; If there are other Operators in that Dormitory, further increases own Morale restored per hour by <@cc.vup>+0.05</> for each additional Operator.
description.8fb9: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.65</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.fa02: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.75</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.c26a: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.7</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.8db4: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.55</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); if the target is <@cc.kw>Ceylon</>, further increases Morale restored by <@cc.vup>+0.45</>
description.588e: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.55</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); if the target is <@cc.kw>Blue Poison</>, further increases Morale restored by <@cc.vup>+0.45</>
description.f873: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.1</> Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.881a: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.1</> Morale per hour to all Operators in that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type triggered). Additionally, for every level of the current Dormitory, <@cc.vup>1 level</> <$cc.bd_a1_a2><@cc.rem>of Dreamland</></>

description.89ac: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.2</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); furthermore, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vup>+0.4</>

description.3ac2: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.3</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); furthermore, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vup>+0.3</>

description.98df: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.5</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place); furthermore, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vup>+0.25</>
description.355a: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vdown>-0.1</>, but restores <@cc.vup>+0.2</> Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
description.edf1: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered per hour <@cc.vdown>-0.1</>, but restores <@cc.vup>+0.25</> Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)

description.7ad9: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, increases HR contacting speed by <@cc.vup>+35%</>, and increases Clue collection speed in the Reception Room by <@cc.vup>+5%</> for each additional Recruitment slot (does not count default slots).
description.7a04: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, increases HR contacting speed by <@cc.vup>+20%</>, and for every <@cc.vup>1</> contacts made, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Blacksteel</> clues (working time and recruitment slots improves the likelihood)
description.0766: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, increases HR contacting speed by <@cc.vup>+20%</>, and for every <@cc.vup>1</> contacts made, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> clues (working time and recruitment slots improves the likelihood)
description.c9f9: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, HR contacting speed <@cc.vup>+20%</>. Additionally, for every Recruit slot (Default slots do not count), <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragments</></> <@cc.vup>+10</>
description.726d: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, for every Recruit slot (Default slots do not count), <<$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>Worldly Plight</></> <@cc.vup>+10</>
description.7a39: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, HR contacting speed<@cc.vup>+20%</>; every <@cc.vup>1</> points of <$cc.bd_ash><@cc.rem>Intelligence Reserve</></> adds extra contacting speed <@cc.vup>+5%</>; every <@cc.vup>1</> bottles of <$cc.bd_tachanka><@cc.rem>Ursus Specialty Beverage</></>, adds extra contacting speed <@cc.vup>+5%</>

description.308a: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, every time that a non-<@cc.kw>Rhine Lab</> clue is collected, the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Rhine Lab</> clues is increased (working time improves the likelihood)
description.f3ca: When this Operator is assigned to the Reception Room, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> clues for every newly-obtained Clue that is not from <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> (working time improves this likelihood).
